# Promoter survey
```{r}
packages <-
  c(
    "stringr",
    "sf",
    "tidyverse",
    "viridis",
    "glue",
    "patchwork",
    "tidyr",
    "dplyr",
    "knitr",
    "kableExtra"
  )

pacman::p_load(
  packages,

)
```
